title: You Are Fearless: A Book for the Littlest Taylor Swift Fans
description: This uplifting read-aloud is a heartfelt wish for all children and a timeless introduction to the Grammy Award-winning and multi platinum singer and songwriter. YOU ARE FEARLESS presents Taylor Swiftâ€™s inspirational journey, encouraging children to be fearless, defy limits, and follow their hearts.Perfect for Taylor Swift fans of all ages!
author: Odd Dot
